sentence: Our room was right over the casino and was extremely noisy and we have a 8 month old and they could not move us they said they were sold out also the air conditioner was leaking onto the rug and was never repaired and we could not step towards the window because rug was soaked very inconvienent possibly moldy
Repair clothes lines
The rooms could use updating which from what I have been told will be starting in April along with a new adult pool
The staff working on the beach also could use an overhaul as they have been there for years and it shows
They need a customer service refresh
Ca n’t complain too much as renovations are to be expected in the low season
BEFORE YOU BOOK CHECK THAT YOU ARE NOT NEAR RENOVATION
Carpet in hallway is old carpet with paint stains must be from renovations
Hyat is under remodeling till November 2018
He then explains that many people have not known about the renovations and that is why he is telling us
Major renovations on lower and upper floors

Nice rooms they were good in 2018 did not technically need renovation but looking forward to seeing 2019 rooms pretty landscaping fun birds to talk to on the property safe environment good restaurants right in immediate area and some nice gift shops
The place was clean the stools comfortable and in good repair and the AC reasonable
Nice Stay in Aruba was not expecting anything spectacular since this was a group trip but was very pleased with service updates to rooms and food
We splurged on one of the newly remodeled family suites so we would have room to spread out for the week room 846
The room looked newly remodeled and was amazing
The rooms are newly renovated and beautiful
Within a few minutes we had nearby house maids and maintenance and engineers all rushing to our room
Our room had been renovated since our last visit
The hotel room were recently renovated and they are beautiful also
